title: Nostalgic Gamemode
body:
Got an idea about a gamemode where you can play all of the heroes before they got reworked like Graves, LeBlanc, Poppy, Rengar etc etc. 
What do you guys think?

replies.body: I'd like that, but they've basically removed the files for those champions from the game.  They'd have to get all those back in to do that, and I'd be willing to bet that would result in a whole host of new bugs and such.
